Home.SelectUSBDrive: Sélectionnez une lecteur USB ou un dossier
Home.RecommendedUSBFlashDriveNonNav: Les APIM sans navigation devraient fonctionner avec 8 Go
Home.RecommendedUSBFlashDriveNA: Les APIM NA, ROW, ANZ nécessiteront au moins 16 Go
Home.RecommendedUSBFlashDriveEU: Les APIM de l'UE nécessiteront au moins 32 Go

MessageBox.DisclaimerNotAccepted: Veuillez lire et accepter la clause de non-responsabilité avant de continuer. Vous ne pourrez pas continuer si vous n’acceptez pas les conditions.
MessageBox.DownloadPathChangeCopy: Souhaitez-vous déplacer des fichiers existants de {0} vers {1}
MessageBox.CancelRegionMismatch: La région actuelle et la nouvelle région ne sont pas les mêmes, cela peut ne pas fonctionner. Souhaitez-vous continuer quand même?
MessageBox.CancelDownloadIsDrive: Le chemin de téléchargement et le lecteur USB de destination sont les mêmes, veuillez modifier votre chemin de téléchargement.
MessageBox.CancelNoApps: Le mode d'installation sélectionné est reformaté ou rétrogradé et Aucun package "APPS" n'a été sélectionné mais Syn3 Updater a déterminé qu'une rétrogradation ou un reformatage est nécessaire, cela entraînera un système qui ne démarrera pas. Abandon!
MessageBox.DownloadInProgress: Un téléchargement ou une copie est déjà en cours, veuillez d'abord attendre ou annuler le téléchargement avant de continuer.
MessageBox.OptionalFormatUSB:
Ce lecteur USB a déjà été utilisé par Syn3 Updater. 

{0} nLettre du lecteur: {1} n
Pour utiliser les fichiers existants sur le lecteur USB, cliquez sur Non
Pour formater le lecteur USB, cliquez sur Oui

Voulez vous souhaitez formater la clé USB sélectionnée?
MessageBox.FailedToValidate3: Échec de la validation {0} 3 fois, PROCESSUS D'AVORTEMENT!
MessageBox.UpdateCurrentversion: Would you like to update the "Current Version" from {0} to {1} so that it is correct for future use?
MessageBox.Completed:
Le téléchargement et la copie des fichiers sont maintenant terminés, éjectez simplement cette clé USB de votre ordinateur et insérez-la dans votre voiture, assurez-vous que le moteur est en marche!NSyn3Updater va maintenant vous ouvrir directement à la partie appropriée du tutoriel CyanLabs pour vous à suivre dans votre voiture.

Si Syn3 Updater vous a été utile, pensez à faire un don à partir de l'onglet "À propos".
MessageBox.LogUtilityComplete: Preparation of the log USB is complete, remove the USB drive from your computer and insert it in to your car, make sure the ignition is on. A few moments after inserting the USB it will say installation complete. Re-insert the USB drive in to your pc and press "Step 3"
Utility.CreateLogDesc: Create a special USB drive used to generate a log file with various details relating to your unit, follow the steps below to get started.
Utility.CreateLogStep2:
2. Insert drive in car
 await "Install Complete"
MessageBox.UpdateCurrentVersionUtility: We have detected that the version installed does not match your currently selected version in the settings, would you like to automatically update this from {0} to {1}
MessageBox.LogUtilityInvalidFile: The XML file you have selected could not be read, please ensure this is the correct file. If you are sure this file is correct please contact CyanLabs so we can investigate further.
Utility.GracenotesRemovalDesc: Use this function to create a USB to force the removal of Gracenotes from your unit.
MessageBox.GenericUtilityComplete: Preparation of the USB is complete, remove the USB drive from your computer and insert it in to your car.
Utility.VoiceShrinkerTitle: Create Small Voice Package Replacement USB
Utility.VoiceShrinkerDesc: Use this function if after removing gracenotes you are still having MEM_ERR's.
Utility.DowngradeDesc: Use this function if after removing gracenotes and shrinking your voice package you are still getting MEM_ERR's
Utility.TroubleshootDesc: Use the below functions to troubleshoot and resolve various MEM_ERR's that you may receive.
About.Endorsed: This software nor CyanLabs is licensed or endorsed by Ford/FoMoCo
MessageBox.AsBuiltVinWarning: NOTE: This will submit your vehicles VIN number to Cyanlabs's online decoding service. By submitting your VIN, this will help increase our database's accuracy. Click OK if your happy with this, otherwise click Cancel
MessageBox.UploadLog:
To assist in troubleshooting any potential issues we would recommend uploading your log to our database, this log file contains details on what options were selected, if you choose not to upload this log you can do at a later date from the "Utility" tab and clicking "Upload Log".

Do you want to upload your log now?
MessageBox.ChangeApplicationReleaseBranc:
Changing branch will restart Syn3 Updater and automatically download the relevant build.

Changing from Ci to Beta/Release may result in unhandled exceptions and require you to reset your settings!

Refer to the documentation for further information

Are you sure you want to change the 'Release Branch' of Syn3 Updater?
MessageBox.CompletedFolder:
The download and copying of the files is now complete
As you have selected a directory rather than a USB drive you will need to copy the contents of your chosen directory to a ExFAT (MBR) formatted USB drive

If Syn3 Updater has been useful to you please consider donating from the "About" tab.
MessageBox.CancelDownloadIsFolder: Download directory and selected destination directory are the same, please change one of these directories
Settings.EnterVersion: Entrez votre version (Paramètres> Général> À propos)
MessageBox.NoVersionOrRegionSelected: Vous n'avez pas défini votre version de ou votre région de actuelle!
MessageBox.My20Detected:
Syn3 Updater has detected that you are trying to force the install mode or disable 'My20 Mode' however a MY20 or newer APIM was previously detected! By doing this and using the created USB drive on a MY20 or newer APIM YOU WILL BRICK IT!!

By clicking 'Yes' you will disable all MY20 protection methods embedded in Syn3 Updater

Are you sure you want to override this protection?
MessageBox.My20Check:
WARNING, ANSWERING INCORRECTLY COULD RESULT IN YOUR APIM BEING BRICKED!

Is you car manufactured in 2020 or newer?

If it is or you are unsure click 'Yes' and Syn3 Updater will guide you through running the official 'interrogator tool' to validate if you have a MY20 APIM or not

If it is 2019 or older, click 'No' to continue as planned.
MessageBox.My20Found: Syn3 Updater has determined that your APIM is MY20 (Manufacture Year 2020) or newer, Syn3 Updater will now enforce autoinstall mode to prevent possible bricking of the APIM!
MessageBox.My20NotFound:
Syn3 Updater has determined that your APIM is NOT MY20 and it is safe to use all functions of Syn3 Updater

Please note that if you have retrofitted your APIM or APIM Screen this information may not be accurate!
MessageBox.LogUtilityCompleteMy20:
Preparation of the Interrogator (Logging) USB Drive completed successfully!

Remove the USB drive from your computer and insert it in to your car, ensure the ignition is on and wait a few moments for it to say "Installation Complete" or for the APIM to reboot.

Once done re-insert the USB drive in to your pc, click 'OK' and select the XML file from your SyncMyRide folder of your USB drive
MessageBox.AdvancedSettings:
WARNING, these settings may cause the USB created by Syn3 Updater to be incompatible with your car configuration, despite what many YouTube videos say you should not change any of these settings unless you know what you are doing!

Are you sure you want to continue?
MessageBox.My20CheckCancelled: No interrogator log file was selected, aborting process!
MessageBox.InvalidProfile: You can not delete the currently active profile, please select another profile and then delete this profile
MessageBox.RemovableDriveFolder:
The folder you have selected is located on a non fixed drive, you should consider selecting the USB itself rather than selecting a folder on the USB drive

If you wish to continue anyway click 'OK'
